Row.Text: One of your Magical Girl reconnaissance squads reported an encounter with the titanic Witch known as Walpurgisnacht. Rumored to appear with no Labyrinth whatsoever, it is considered to be a horrific amalgamation of several other Witches. If there is any truth to this report, the entire world is right to be fearful. However, it seems its appearance was only temporary.
We can only hope that's the case.
Walpurgisnacht seems to have made no further appearances, and as time passes, so will the populace forget the report.
found girl?[NEWLINE]name Meduka[NEWLINE]say she from an other world[NEWLINE]like us but bad draw[NEWLINE]and bad wordings[NEWLINE]think this world great![NEWLINE]will live with us!
